nl.tudelft.jpacman.board

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.board.Square

  • public abstract class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    A square on a Board, which can (or cannot, depending on the type) be occupied by units.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Square()
      Creates a new, empty square.

      • getSquareAt

        public Square getSquareAt(Direction direction)
        Returns the square adjacent to this square.
        Parameters:

      • link

        public void link(Square neighbour,
                 Direction direction)
        Links this square to a neighbour in the given direction. Note that this is a one-way connection.
        Parameters:
        neighbour - The neighbour to link.
        direction - The direction the new neighbour is in, as seen from this cell.

      • getOccupants

        public java.util.List<Unit> getOccupants()
        Returns an immutable list of units occupying this square, in the order in which they occupied this square (i.e. oldest first.).
        Returns:
        An immutable list of units occupying this square, in the order in which they occupied this square (i.e. oldest first.)
